review: Fallout: New Vegas is a very fun free roam, RPG Shooter because the area you explore is intresting, the quest are fun and it feels so satisfying to kill someone with any weapon!The only problems are having to config the game to stop the screen flickering and the random crashes that happen often.other than that You should buy the Ultimate edition of this game when its on sale.
